It was almost the end of October when young Sandi Cassandra Quinn got a scary letter from her friend Christy in the mail. It wasn't the letter itself so much as scary as what it said:

"Hey 'Cas'-Play Quinn,

What's up! I'm throwing a costume party on Halloween night at 7 p.m. until the morning light and was wondering if you wanted to come. Being you, though, I know the last thing you need to worry about at an event like this is having nothing to wear! (lol)

So yeah, if you want to come, send me an e-mail, or call me at my home phone number. I invited Joe, too. He says he can't wait to see what you'll be wearing (as will I!).

Hope to see you there!

- Your friend, Christina Lombard

The party was three days away, so at first Sandi didn't worry about what to wear. She concentrated on her college studies and forgot about it, actually.

That is, until the day came..

It was now Halloween night at 7:23 p.m. Sandi was being picked up by her friend Joe in just seven minutes for the party, and she still had no idea what to wear!

"Oh man, why did I wait so long to choose an outfit!?" Sandi muttered to herself as she looked around her closet for something to wear. She pulled four specific clothes that she thought looked nice:

1.) A Godzilla she wore when she was very little (four years old)
2.) A dark-blue "classic" Japanese high school uniform (taken from a figurine of one of her brother's many anime figurines)
3.) A long, beautiful dark blue dress
4.) An extra-large t-shirt and pants

Of course, there were even more clothes that piqued her interest, though she attempted to try these four pieces of clothing first. Which one should she choose?

info.brief_description: Meet Sandi, the girl who can grow or shrink to fit into anything she wants to wear.
info.description:
Nineteen year old Sandi Cassandra Quinn loves to dress up in costumes. In fact, she actually has an unique ability she was born with that helps her in this hobby of hers: whenever she dons a pair of clothes, she shrinks or grow to match their size. For example, if she touches and attempts to wear Barbie clothes, she'll shrink down to the size of a Barbie.

Sandi herself has long, twin braids of dark brown hair. She has heterochromia (her left eye is blue, and her right eye is green), as well as a beauty mark under her right eye. Her height tends to vary on the clothes she wears, though she's typically around 4'11" to 5'4" in height (when nude, she's always exactly 5 feet tall). She has an older brother, Tom, who is 21 years old and is an anime/manga fan. Because of this, Sandi has gotten used to cos-playing in various conventions, as her brother's habit of watching anime soon rubbed off on her. (Rumor has it she attends as many as five conventions a year across the United States.)

Sandi is cheerful, helpful, intelligent, and considered to be cute amongst boys her age. She doesn't have a boyfriend, but she has a guy friend named Joe. The two have known each other since the sixth grade. He has a crush on her, though he's never admitted it.

Now that Sandi's profile is out of the way, let's explain the rules:

1.) Only Sandi can change size. No one else can.
2.) In addition to her height, Sandi's body can change to fit her clothes. For example, a extra large size shirt will make her fat, too.
3.) Nudity is allowed, but if that happens, Sandi will return to a default 5 foot height automatically.
4.) Most everyone knows of Sandi's ability, so don't let that stop you from creating situations where her being big/small will be awkward.

Hope you enjoy the story!
